mapper.insert: insert INTO USER (`username`, `nickname`, `password`, `address`, `email`, `phone`, `img`, `extra`, `isDeleted`, `created`, `updated`) VALUES ( ${username}, ${nickname}, ${password}, ${address}, ${email}, ${phone}, ${img}, ${extra}, 0, unix_timestamp(now()), unix_timestamp(now()) )
mapper.select: select * from user where username=#{username} limit 1
select * from user where userId=#{userId} limit 1;
